description: This file provides a client-side storage service for managing notes, including functions to load, save, normalize, and perform CRUD operations on notes stored in localStorage.

methods.name: rid
methods.description: Generates a simple random identifier combining a random string and timestamp.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the list of notes from localStorage, parsing JSON data or returning an empty array on failure.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves the list of notes to localStorage as a JSON string.

methods.name: normalize
methods.description: Normalizes a note object by ensuring it has an id, trimmed title and content, and timestamps.
